Sánchez Gutiérrez, R
Roldán Nogueras, J

Márquez Moyano, J A
metadata.dc:description: The Burkitt's lymphoma is a haematological neoplasia typical of early ages. In our country, the lymphatic nodes affectation is the most usual. We present a case report with a 12 year-old boy who consults for a asymptomatic cervical mass. The ultimate diagnosic was a nasopharyngeal Burkitt's lymphoma with neck extension.
metadata.dc:title: Linfoma de Burkitt nasofaríngeo en edad pediátrica.
[Burkitt's nasopharyngeal lymphoma in pediatric age].
